Mukade shoots purple flames from his [[puppet]] body's mouth using the [[Ryūmyaku]] [[chakra]]. The attack leaves a residue of purple flame around the area.

== Trivia ==
* This technique likely takes its name from the fact that Ryūmyaku means "Dragon Vein".
